definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: city in the Negeb of Judah Jos 15:56, 1Sa 25:43 (home of Ahinoam, one of David's wives), site unknown; cf. n.pr.m. 1Ch 4:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: city in Issachar Jos 19:18 on NW. spur of Mt. Gilboa 2Sa 4:4 (cf. 1Sa 31:1, 1Sa 31:8) 1Ki 4:12 (cf. 1Sa 31:10, 1Sa 31:12), mod. Zer‘în (Rob:BR ii. 318 ff. Bd:Pal 244), close to scene of great battle with Philistines 1Sa 29:1 (´[[בְּעַיִן אשׁר בְיִז]], cf. Rob:BR ii. 323) v:1Sa 29:11; subject to Ishbosheth 2Sa 2:9 (yet v. infr.), residence of Ahab and Jehoram of Isr. 1Ki 18:45, 1Ki 18:46, 1Ki 21:1 (Naboth) 2Ki 8:29, 2Ki 8:29 = 2Ch 22:6, 2Ch 22:6, 2Ki 9:15, 2Ki 9:15, 2Ki 9:16, 2Ki 9:17, 2Ki 9:30, 2Ki 10:11 cf. [[דְּמֵי]] ´[[יִז]] Ho 1:4, and symbolical name of Hosea's son Ho 1:4 (cf. Che);—in 2Ki 10:1 for ´[[שָׂרֵי יִז]] rd. [[שָׂרֵי]] [[שׁׂמְרוֹן]] so LXX. Used by Hosea as representing Isr., with play on etymol., Ho 2:24 (cf. [[וּזְרַעְתִּיהָ לִּי]] [[בָּאָרֶץ]] v:Ho 2:23), cf. also ´[[גׇּדוֹל יוֹם יִז]] v:Ho 2:2.
